name: Sonic Alpha
storyline: A mysterious recurrence happened once again as Angel Island is seen landed in the ocean and to top it off little planet is seen right above it in the sky! What is going on? And what's Eggman / Dr.Robotnik up too? Find out in the next episode of- er, I mean, find out in Sonic Alpha!
summary: Sonic Alpha is a 2D classic sonic fan game inspired off the time when older 2D Sonic fan games were made such as Sonic XG, Sonic Nexus, Sonic Classic, Sonic Axiom, etc; with a Mania inspired touch. It will feature returning stages as well as new ones.
